mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT cr.CHAT_ROOM_CODE, cr.CHAT_ROOM_TITLE
, m.USER_CODE, u.USER_EMAIL, m.MESSAGE_CODE, m.MESSAGE_CONTENT, m.MESSAGE_DATE
FROM CHAT_ROOM cr
LEFT JOIN MESSAGE m ON (m.CHAT_ROOM_CODE = cr.CHAT_ROOM_CODE) LEFT JOIN CHAT_JOIN cj ON (m.CHAT_ROOM_CODE = cj.CHAT_ROOM_CODE) LEFT JOIN `USER` u ON (m.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE) WHERE cr.CHAT_ROOM_CODE = #{roomCode}
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CHAT_ROOM_CODE) + 1, 1) FROM CHAT_ROOM
INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM ( CHAT_ROOM_CODE , CHAT_ROOM_TITLE ) VALUES ( #{roomCode} , #{roomTitle} )
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_JOIN_CODE, cj.USER_CODE, CHAT_ROOM_CODE, u.USER_EMAIL FROM CHAT_JOIN cj JOIN `USER` u ON ( cj.USER_CODE = u.USER_CODE ) WHERE cj.CHAT_ROOM_CODE = #{roomCode}
